title: 5–4–3–2–1 Grounding
summary: Settle the nervous system with a sensory scan.
safety_notes: If dizziness or panic escalates, slow down and focus on one sense (touch) with steady nasal breathing.

offCopy.intro: We'll anchor attention to the senses to reduce stress.

steps.label: See (5)
steps.body: Name five things you can see.

steps.label: Touch (4)
steps.body: Notice four things you can feel against your skin.

steps.label: Hear (3)
steps.body: Identify three sounds, near or far.

steps.label: Taste (1)
steps.body: Notice one taste, even if faint; sip water if needed.

offCopy.completion: You're back in the present. Continue with slow, comfortable nasal breaths.

verseKJV.text: Fear thou not; for I am with thee...

light.prompt: Quietly acknowledge God's nearness as you sense the world.

verseKJV.text: Be still, and know that I am God...

disciple.identity: You dwell in His presence; your senses are gifts to ground you.

verseKJV.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley... thou art with me;

kingdom.commission: Receive His peace so you can bring peace to others.
